# 程序使用方法：
## sys.argv
```bash
python IBD.py ./testdata/111-1173-9987.sfs ./testdata/111-1175-1798.sfs ./snpsort.s
```
## sys.stdin
```bash
cat ./testdata/111-1173-9987.sfs ./testdata/separator.txt ./testdata/111-1175-1798.sfs ./testdata/separator.txt ./snpsort.s ./testdata/separator.txt ./testdata/filenames.txt | python ibd.py
```
> 因为结果需要文件名中的内容，所以将文件信息加入标准输入的最后一部分， 即使用 `separator` 分割标准输出为 4 部分，最后一部分是文件名

# 结果
```
111-1173-9987	111-1175-1798	0.0681562548944	1,45585337,54674473,1136|1,65271101,74919066,1197|1,168618641,175986057,1044|2,194872183,203438090,924|3,9716053,19420508,1872|3,101679494,111687410,1209|4,65170415,72967922,928|4,118637560,126363183,940|5,38100579,52240974,1151|5,52240974,66139238,1768|6,95357179,103378360,853|7,108843491,118052278,1105|10,83996098,94259699,1411|10,108314429,118886784,1690|11,1056981,8238428,1788|11,107807830,115222962,1254|13,58026685,65229876,727|15,40704394,48125257,1054|17,55875885,63357607,894|18,40028311,47406938,1331|20,23019541,39288490,1802
```
